content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>NOAA National Marine Fisheries Service</origin>         <pubdate>19980902</pubdate>         <title>Hawksbill Sea Turtle Critical Habitat</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>         <onlink>http://sero.nmfs.noaa.gov/maps_gis_data/protected_resources/critical_habitat/index.html</onlink>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>These data represent the critical habitat for hawksbill turtle as designated by Federal Register Vol. 63, No. 46701, September 2, 1998, Rules and Regulations. Redesignated and amended at 64 FR 14607, March 23, 1999.</abstract>       <purpose>The purpose of these data is to visually represent the critical habitat areas for GIS analysis and display.</purpose>     </descript>     <timeperd>       <timeinfo>         <sngdate>           <caldate>19980902</caldate>         </sngdate>       </timeinfo>       <current>ground condition</current>     </timeperd>     <status>       <progress>Complete</progress>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-68.005125</westbc>         <eastbc>-67.794484</eastbc>         <northbc>18.209539</northbc>         <southbc>18.004458</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>GIS</themekey>         <themekey>Eretmochelys imbricata</themekey>         <themekey>Hawksbill Sea Turtle</themekey>         <themekey>Endangered Species</themekey>         <themekey>Critical Habitat</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>biota</themekey>         <themekey>boundaries</themekey>         <themekey>environment</themekey>         <themekey>oceans</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Puerto Rico</placekey>         <placekey>Monito Island</placekey>         <placekey>Mona Island</placekey>         <placekey>Caribbean</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>Users be advised that the accuracy of this data set is completely dependent upon the accuracy of the shoreline data used in the creation process. For more details on this process, see the process description. The text description in 63 FR 46701 is always the one, true definition of hawksbill turtle critical habitat. These or any other depictions are for information purposes only and shouldn't be relied on for regulatory purposes.</useconst>     <ptcontac>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>NOAA-National Marine Fisheries Service</cntorg>           <cntper>Jennifer Moore</cntper>         </cntorgp>         <cntpos>Natural Resource Specialist</cntpos>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype>           <address>263 13th Avenue South</address>           <city>St. Petersburg</city>           <state>FL</state>           <postal>33071</postal>           <country>US</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntvoice>727-824-5312</cntvoice>         <cntfax>727-824-5309</cntfax>         <cntemail>Jennifer.Moore@noaa.gov</cntemail>         <hours>Monday - Friday, 8:00am - 5:00pm</hours>       </cntinfo>     </ptcontac>     <native>Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143</native>     <crossref>       <citeinfo>         <title>NOAA Navigation Chart 25671_1</title>       </citeinfo>     </crossref>   </idinfo>   <dataqual>     <logic>Not Applicable</logic>     <complete>Complete Pending NMFS PRD Review</complete>     <posacc>       <horizpa>         <qhorizpa>           <horizpae>NOAA Navigation Chart 25671_1 (Scale= 1:100,000)</horizpae>         </qhorizpa>       </horizpa>     </posacc>     <lineage>       <srcinfo>         <srccite>           <citeinfo>             <origin>NOAA NOS</origin>             <title>NOAA Navigational Chart 25671_1</title>           </citeinfo>         </srccite>         <typesrc>hardcopy</typesrc>         <srccitea>NOAA Navigational Chart 25671_1</srccitea>       </srcinfo>       <procstep>         <procdesc>Land area was erased from the buffer area using ET Geowizards. The source of land area used to erase was from the NCCOS project for coral and seafloor mapping.</procdesc>         <srcused>Q:\\ARCDATA\\GEODATA\\States\\PRVI\\shoreln_prvi_NCCOS_po</srcused>       </procstep>       <procstep>         <procdesc>Detailed shoreline for Mona and Monito Islands from NOAA digital vector chart was created, then a 3 nautical mile buffer was generated using ESRI's ArcGIS software.</procdesc>         <srcused>Fish and Wildlife Service (FWS), Department of the Interior and National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Department of Commerce - Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Designation of Critical Habitat for the green turtle, [63 FR 46701]</srcused>         <procdate>20050712</procdate>
